title: Bourbon Street shooter Trung Le sentenced to 60 years in prison
content:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) -
Convicted Bourbon Street shooter Trung Le was sentenced to 60 years in prison.
Judge to Le: I don't think you're a hit man but I think you are someone who displayed a reckless disregard for public safety
— Deven Clarke (@DevenClarke) April 4, 2016
Le was 40 years for manslaughter and 20 years for attempted manslaughter.
